rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody: Ne perdideris me domine cum iniquitatibus meis neque in finem iratus reserves mala mea

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S Hyd

verses.vBody: Miserere mei deus miserere mei quoniam in te confidit anima mea
Exaudi deus orationem meam et ne despexeris deprecationem meam intende in me et exaudi me

rep.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd
